thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 707
thread.title: kirstymacpherson
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by kirstymacpherson

author: kirstymacpherson
title: kirstymacpherson
text: Not sure the sales girl understood how the excess worked. She said that even if it were not your fault in an accident that they took all of the $4400 excess no matter the size of the damage and that they did not give any of it back even once the 'at fault' party's insurance had paid for the damage.
